name: Clad in Iron: Gulf of Mexico 1864
description: Manage your fleet and army, hunt the enemy's fleet, hide your weak squadrons in protected ports until reinforcements arrive, blockade enemy trade routes, amphibious assaults, struggle for dominance over the seas in turned-based strategic mode.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2 Processor: CPU Pentium 4 / Athlon 1.1 GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: compatible with DirectX 9.0C 512 Mb DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 780 MB available space Sound Card: compatible with DirectX 16-bit
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows 7/8/10 Processor: CPU Pentium 4 / Athlon 2,4 GHz Memory: 2048 MB MB RAM Graphics: compatible with DirectX 9.0C 1024 Mb DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 780 MB available space Sound Card: compatible with DirectX 16-bit
